Vipol Mui Ne Hotels and Restaurants Adds Three Properties to Growing Portfolio

By: Angela Hansen
View: 100

Date: 26/04/2022

Tired of searching on internet and asking friends for suggestions for Candle Light Dinner?Not anymore. See a lot of options for Candle Light Dinner and Lunch in your city, just by sitting at home, with clear information and real pictures. Book online easily by paying just 50% amount, rest on arrival. use Coupon Code ADVANCE50 at the checkout. Area is mentioned in the description of all the packages, exact name and address will be sent to you within an hour of the booking with Google Maps location.

Experience phenomenal dining at Vipol Muine Hotel & Spa in one of our six on-site restaurants. Feast, our signature restaurant,offers tantalizing International meals along with interactive cooking stations. Join us for breakfast, lunch and dinner at Feast's specialty theme buffets. Mix things up at Steam n' Spice, serving elevated street food and Asian fusion cuisine. Altitude Rooftop Bar offers guests signature handcrafted cocktails and picturesque views of Mui Ne in a sleek setting. Relax poolside with light-bites and a refreshing beverage at Plunge, our open-air bar. Toastina serves fresh-baked pastries and an assortment of coffee in an al fresco environment. Whatever sparks your interest, there's something for everyone at Vipol Muine Hotel & Spa

Take Him/Her out this time to celebrate your upcoming occasion & experience an amazing Poolside Candlelight Dinner in Delhi At one of the finest 5-Star Hotel i.e.Jaypee Siddharth located in Rajendra Place. Beautiful ambience, Dim lights and beautifully decorated dining table with candles & petals is our little\ recipe to make your date night a memorable one.

Your experience begins with welcome drinks followed by delicious 3 Course meal specially curated by the chef. Being seated with your partner in such a place is memorable on it’s own.You can customize your experience by adding a cake, bouquet of roses & even an extra person also if required. So don’t wait, Just book the Poolside Candlelight Dinner In New Delhi At Jaypee Siddharth and get onboard to experience a 5-Star hospitality.
